SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdminMenu
Admin Menu Panel to display database inside of the application
AirbusA320
AirbusA320 object extends Aircraft, contains all Seat objects related to a specific Flight
Aircraft
Abstract aircraft object, extend this object to create a new aircraft type
BackgroundImagePanel
Background Image Panel class for constructing a JPanel with image
Boeing737
Boeing737 object extends Aircraft, contains all Seat objects related to a specific Flight
Booking
Booking object containing everything needed to create, read, update or remove a booking from database
DBConnectivity
Class providing database access and functionality
ExtrasMenu
Extras menu used during the flight booking process to select extras such as priority boarding and 20kg luggage
FileUtilities
Class providing helper methods for files
Flight
Flight object containing all flight details including Aircraft and Seats
FlightFareSelectionMenu
Flight Fare Selection Menu used during the Booking process to choose the Booking tier
FlightsConstants
Interface containing preset constants used by other classes such as Colors and Fonts
FlightSelection
FlightSelection is a GUI component that allows users to select flights for a trip.
Generator
Class to automatically generate Flights and Bookings into the database
JErrorDialog
Helper class to display JOptionPane messages and automatically print exceptions to System.err with timestamps
JPlaceHolderTextField
JPlaceHolderTextField is alike a regular JTextField however it has a placeholder associated with it
Placeholder is stored as a string in each instance of JPlaceHolderTextField
JSubmitButton
Custom button class that extends JButton and includes custom butting styling and font
JTopBar
Class for the top menu bar JPanel used across all screens
LoginMenu
Login Menu screen used to log in and access the Admin Menu
Main
Main class containing public static void main and the main JFrame
MainWindow
Main Menu of the flights project
MyBookingMenu
MyBooking Menu used to enter Booking credentials to access and view a Booking
Passenger
Passenger object containing its details and Seat details
PassengerSeatSelectionMenu
Passenger Seat Selection Menu used to allow Passengers to select their Flight Seat(s)
Payment
Pseudo Payment class to "process" payments
PaymentMenu
Payment Menu used during the Booking process to process payment, finish the Booking and display Booking confirmation to the user
RoundButton
Class to make a round button Swing component that extends JButton
Seat
Seat class containing Seat information
SelectSeatBoeing737
Seat selection screen for the Boeing 737 used to select seats for a new or existing Booking
SetPassengers
Set Passengers menu used to enter all passenger details for the Booking, as well as the Booking email
ViewBookingMenu
View Booking Menu Panel used to view a booking, amend its details, delete a booking or check the flight weather
Weather
Class to access weather details from Open Meteo for a specific Flight
